text:
Hi <@U04B3M0M18E>
When you say Popup form, are you referring to the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ctas/create-calls-to-action|CTA feature>?
Yeah <@U053KDY5TV1> - We have a brand domain, but it always renders these assets under the `https://<account>.hs-sites` I don’t want that

Yeah, unfortunately, that's how CTAs work and there is nothing else you can do.
There is a way to create custom CTAs with your own CSS & HTML but I don't know if that helps you now:
CTAs -> Create new -> Embeds and Buttons -> Advanced -> Embedded HTML
Hmmm… that’s very unfortunate. but the custom route might work. Thanks <@U053KDY5TV1>
